content.title: Documents Scanner
content.subTitle: Scan with Ease
content.description: Scan any document instantly with your mobile device by just a few steps. Save as PDF,JPG,ZIP,TXT and Word format.

content.title: Sign & Stamp
content.subTitle: One-Tap Focus
content.description: Draw, scan or import your signature and stamp with a simple touch. Sign and stamp any document with just a single tap!

content.title: Batch Scanning
content.subTitle: Multiple Page Scan
content.description: Scan multiple pages or documents in multiple-scanning mode. Batch all scans as a single document.

content.title: Advanced filters
content.subTitle: Unique Filters
content.description: Apply advanced filters and enhance quality with various custom made filters. Manually edit brightness and contrast by your own choice on the custom filters.

content.title: Export & share
content.subTitle: All-Round Conversion
content.description: Export your scans as PDF,JPG,ZIP,TXT and Word.
